trans-unit.source: jStorage or simpleStorage << my preference
trans-unit.target: jStorage或simpleStorage <<我的偏爱

trans-unit.source: Store.js << another good option
trans-unit.target: Store.js <<另一个不错的选择

trans-unit.source: LOCALSTORAGE.CYCLICJSON has .stringify and .parse just like normal JSON, but works with objects with circular references. ("Works" meaning parse(stringify(obj)) and obj are deep equal AND have identical sets of 'inner equalities')
trans-unit.target: LOCALSTORAGE.CYCLICJSON 与普通 JSON 一样具有 .stringify 和 .parse ，但可用于具有循环引用的对象。（“ Works”的意思是parse（stringify（obj））和obj深度相等，并且具有相同的“内部相等性”集）

trans-unit.source: However, Function serialization/deserialization is unreliable because it is implementation-dependent.
trans-unit.target: 但是，函数序列化/反序列化是不可靠的，因为它依赖于实现。

trans-unit.source: I do not recommend to store functions because eval() is evil can lead to issues regarding security, optimisation and debugging. In general, eval() should never be used in JavaScript code.
trans-unit.target: 我不建议存储函数，因为 eval() 是邪恶的，可能导致有关安全性，优化和调试的问题。通常，不应在JavaScript代码中使用 eval() 。

trans-unit.source: LocalStorage only support String format for key/value.
trans-unit.target: LocalStorage仅支持键/值的字符串格式。

trans-unit.source: The very big downside: it depends on Object.observe() so it has very limited browser support. And it doesn't look like it'll be coming for Firefox or Edge anytime soon.
trans-unit.target: 很大的缺点：它取决于 Object.observe() ,因此它对浏览器的支持非常有限。而且看起来它不会很快就用于Firefox或Edge。

trans-unit.source: A minor improvement on a variant:

trans-unit.source: A workaround can be to stringify your object before storing it, and later parse it when you retrieve it:
trans-unit.target: 一种解决方法是在存储对象之前先对其进行字符串化，然后在检索它时对其进行解析：

trans-unit.source: Adrian.
trans-unit.target: Adrian.

trans-unit.source: All EJSON serializations are also valid JSON. For example an object with a date and a binary buffer would be serialized in EJSON as:
trans-unit.target: 所有的EJSON序列化也是有效的JSON。例如,一个带有日期和二进制缓冲区的对象将在EJSON中被序列化为:

trans-unit.source: And every new object inside a tracked object will be automatically tracked.
trans-unit.target: 并且跟踪对象内的每个新对象都会被自动跟踪。

trans-unit.target: 并轻松取回

trans-unit.source: Another problem stringify can't deal with are circular references:
trans-unit.target: stringify 无法处理的另一个问题是循环引用：

trans-unit.source: As you can see, the primitive values are respected.
trans-unit.target: 可以看出,原始值是被尊重的。

trans-unit.source: Because of short-circuit evaluation, getObject() will immediately return null if key is not in Storage. It also will not throw a SyntaxError exception if value is "" (the empty string; JSON.parse() cannot handle that).
trans-unit.target: 由于短路评估，如果 key 不在Storage中，则 getObject() 将立即返回 null 。如果 value 是 "" （空字符串； JSON.parse() 无法处理），它也不会引发 SyntaxError 异常。

trans-unit.source: Binary (JavaScript Uint8Array or the result of EJSON.newBinary)
trans-unit.target: 二进制（JavaScript的 Uint8Array 或结果EJSON.newBinary）

trans-unit.target: 但我们可以直接用捷径就可以了。

trans-unit.target: EJSON是JSON的扩展,支持更多的类型。它支持所有的JSON安全类型,以及。

trans-unit.source: Extending the Storage object is an awesome solution. For my API, I have created a facade for localStorage and then check if it is an object or not while setting and getting.
trans-unit.target: 扩展Storage对象是一个很棒的解决方案。对于我的API,我为localStorage创建了一个门面,然后在设置和获取时检查它是否是一个对象。

trans-unit.source: For Typescript users willing to set and get typed properties:
trans-unit.target: 对于愿意设置和获取类型化属性的Typescript用户。

trans-unit.source: For example persisto is an open source project that provides an easy interface to localStorage/sessionStorage and automates persistence for form fields (input, radio buttons, and checkboxes).
trans-unit.target: 例如，persisto是一个开源项目，它提供了一个到localStorage / sessionStorage的简单接口，并自动执行表单字段（输入，单选按钮和复选框）的持久性。

trans-unit.target: 然而,找到一个高效的存储循环引用的解决方案,高度依赖于需要解决的任务,恢复这些数据也不是一件小事。

trans-unit.source: I added some types to my wrapper including regular expressions and functions

trans-unit.source: I arrived at this post after hitting on another post that has been closed as a duplicate of this - titled 'how to store an array in localstorage?'. Which is fine except neither thread actually provides a full answer as to how you can maintain an array in localStorage - however I have managed to craft a solution based on information contained in both threads.
trans-unit.target: 我是在发现另一个帖子被关闭了,而这个帖子的标题是'如何在localstorage中存储数组?这很好,只是这两个线程都没有提供一个完整的答案,如何在localStorage中维护一个数组--不过我根据这两个线程中的信息,设计了一个解决方案。

trans-unit.source: I can store and retrieve primitive JavaScript types and arrays using localStorage, but objects don't seem to work. Should they?
trans-unit.target: 我可以使用 localStorage 存储和检索原始JavaScript类型和数组，但是对象似乎无法正常工作。应该吗

trans-unit.source: I found a way to make it work with objects that have cyclic references.
trans-unit.target: 我找到了一个方法,让它和有循环引用的对象一起工作。

trans-unit.source: I made a thing that doesn't break the existing Storage objects, but creates a wrapper so you can do what you want. The result is a normal object, no methods, with access like any object.
trans-unit.target: 我做了一个东西,不破坏现有的Storage对象,而是创建了一个包装器,这样你就可以做你想做的事情。结果就是一个普通的对象,没有方法,和其他对象一样有访问权限。

trans-unit.source: I made another minimalistic wrapper with only 20 lines of code to allow using it like it should:
trans-unit.target: 我又做了一个只有20行代码的极简包装器,可以像它应该的那样使用。

trans-unit.source: I see this behavior in Safari, Chrome, and Firefox, so I assume it's my misunderstanding of the HTML5 Web Storage spec, not a browser-specific bug or limitation.
trans-unit.target: 我在Safari，Chrome和Firefox中看到了这种行为，因此我认为这是我对HTML5 Web存储规范的误解，而不是浏览器特定的错误或限制。

trans-unit.source: I'd like to store a JavaScript object in HTML5 localStorage, but my object is apparently being converted to a string.
trans-unit.target: 我想将JavaScript对象存储在HTML5 localStorage 中，但是我的对象显然正在转换为字符串。

trans-unit.source: I've tried to make sense of the structured clone algorithm described in http://www.w3.org/TR/html5/infrastructure.html. I don't fully understand what it's saying, but maybe my problem has to do with my object's properties not being enumerable (???)
trans-unit.target: 我试图弄清http://www.w3.org/TR/html5/infrastructure.html中描述的结构化克隆算法。我不完全理解这是什么意思，但也许我的问题与我的对象的属性不可枚举有关（???）

trans-unit.target: 在此示例中， JSON.stringify() 将引发 TypeError “将圆形结构转换为JSON”。如果应该支持存储循环引用，则可以使用 JSON.stringify() 的第二个参数：

trans-unit.source: Is there an easy workaround?
trans-unit.target: 有没有一个简单的办法?

trans-unit.source: It doesn't use JSON.stringify/parse because that would be inaccurate and slow on big objects. Instead, each terminal value has its own localStorage entry.
trans-unit.target: 它没有使用JSON.stringifyparse,因为这样做在大对象上会不准确,而且速度很慢。相反,每个终端值都有自己的localStorage条目。

trans-unit.source: It looks to me like the setItem method is converting the input to a string before storing it.
trans-unit.target: 在我看来， setItem 方法在存储输入之前将输入转换为字符串。

trans-unit.source: The problem with using JSON.stringify() for storing objects is, that this function can not serialise private members. This issue can be solved by overwriting the .toString() method (which is called implicitly when storing data in web storage):
trans-unit.target: 使用 JSON.stringify() 存储对象的问题是，此函数无法序列化私有成员。可以通过覆盖 .toString() 方法（在Web存储中存储数据时隐式调用）解决此问题：

trans-unit.source: Update: The W3C eventually changed their minds about the structured-clone specification, and decided to change the spec to match the implementations. See https://www.w3.org/Bugs/Public/show_bug.cgi?id=12111. So this question is no longer 100% valid, but the answers still may be of interest.
trans-unit.target: 更新：W3C最终改变了对结构化克隆规范的想法，并决定更改该规范以匹配实现。参见https://www.w3.org/Bugs/Public/show_bug.cgi?id=12111。因此，此问题不再100％有效，但答案可能仍然很有趣。

trans-unit.source: User-defined types (see EJSON.addType. For example, Mongo.ObjectID is implemented this way.)
trans-unit.target: 用户定义的类型（请参阅EJSON.addType。例如，Mongo.ObjectID以这种方式实现。）

trans-unit.source: We can't do JSON.stringify here, because of the circular references.
trans-unit.target: 由于循环引用，我们无法在此处执行 JSON.stringify 。

trans-unit.source: Well you may strip the aliases part with .bind(...). However I just put it in since it's really good to know about this. I tooked me hours to find out why a simple get = localStorage.getItem; don't work
trans-unit.target: 好吧，您可以使用 .bind(...) 去除别名部分。但是我只是把它放进去，因为了解这一点真的很好。我花了几个小时找出为什么简单的 get = localStorage.getItem; 不工作

trans-unit.source: You can set an object
trans-unit.target: 你可以设置一个对象

trans-unit.source: You can use ejson to store the objects as strings.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用ejson将对象存储为字符串。

trans-unit.source: You can use localDataStorage to transparently store javascript data types (Array, Boolean, Date, Float, Integer, String and Object). It also provides lightweight data obfuscation, automatically compresses strings, facilitates query by key (name) as well as query by (key) value, and helps to enforce segmented shared storage within the same domain by prefixing keys.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用localDataStorage透明地存储javascript数据类型（数组，布尔值，日期，浮点数，整数，字符串和对象）。它还提供轻量级的数据混淆，自动压缩字符串，方便按键（名称）查询和按（键）值查询，并通过在键之前添加前缀来帮助在同一域中强制执行分段共享存储。

trans-unit.source: You cannot store key value without String Format.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有字符串格式，则无法存储键值。
